diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $x-1$ units.
The length of the line $CE$ is $x+2$ units.
The length of the line $EF$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $BA$ is $3$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $B$.
Point $G$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $A$.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $E$.
Point $C$ also lies on the line connecting $B$ and $E$.
Point $D$ also lies on the line connecting $E$ and $C$.
Point $G$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $F$.
The line $AB$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
The line $FE$ is perpendicular to the line $ED$.
